headline: SAMCO UV OZONE CLEANING / STRIPPING SYSTEM
description: UV & Ozone Cleaning and Stripping System    Samco UV300X
categories.lvl1: Semiconductor Manufacturing Equipment > Other Semiconductor Manufacturing Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Samco
Model UV-300
Description UV & Ozone Cleaning/Stripping
Other Information Large reaction chamber accommodates substrates up to 12" in diameter
Rotating sample stage ensures high uniformity of cleaning /stripping rate across the substrate surface
Built-in "ozone killer" for complete removal of ozone in the exhaust
Water cooled
Year of Manufacture 1998
Power Requirements 110 V 20.0 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 21.654 in (55.0 cm)
Depth 16.929 in (43.0 cm)
Height 23.819 in (60.5 cm)
